user.description:
Please select your NWS lookup method.
For a brief explanation of the advantages and disadvantages of each method please see [here](https://github.com/finity69x2/nws_alerts/blob/master/lookup_options.txt).
If you don't know which is better for your situation, you should probably select the Zone ID version.

gps_loc.description: Please enter your latitude and longitude, by default your coordinates from Home Assistant are used.

zone.description:
You can find your Zone or County ID by going to https://alerts.weather.gov/,
scroll down to your state and click on the 'zone list' and/or 'county list' then look for the entry for your county.
Seperate multiple zones with commas ie: PAC049,WVC031

Zones closest to you will be populated automatically.
